column1: #Text=Korra says : " Uh , I was just looking for a bathroom and I got lost . "
#Text=Toza says : " Ah , the old " I had to pee " excuse !
#Text=It 's all right Toza , she 's with me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , I 'm with him .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , you see , we 're together .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , not together together , more like friends .
#Text=No , no , I did n't mean to imply .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , you implied it .
#Text=" Toza says : " Ah , I do n't care what you are !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Rrright this way , miss .
